items.label: verif-density-bound-consistency-full
items.title: A Posteriori Consistency of Density Assumption
items.content:
741: :label: verif-density-bound-consistency-full
742: 
743: We verify that the assumed density bound ρ_max is **self-consistent** with the derived C³ regularity.
744: 
745: **Logical structure**:
746: 1. **Assume** ρ_max (Assumption {prf:ref}`assump-uniform-density-full` below)
747: 2. **Derive** C³ regularity using ρ_max (doc-13, companion availability, bounded sums)
748: 3. **Extract** Lipschitz constant L_V from C³ bounds (doc-13 Theorem 8.1)
749: 4. **Compute** Fokker-Planck bound C_FK(L_V, γ, T, V_max) (Lemma {prf:ref}`lem-fokker-planck-density-bound-conservative-full`)
750: 5. **Check** whether C_FK is compatible with assumed ρ_max
751: 
752: **Consistency condition**:
753: 
754: $$
755: C_{\text{FK}}(L_V(\rho_{\max}), \gamma, T, V_{\max}) \leq C_{\text{QSD}} \cdot \rho_{\max}
756: $$
757: 
758: **Interpretation**: If this inequality holds for a chosen value of ρ_max, the assumption set is **consistent**. The fixed point ρ_max* satisfying:
759: 
760: $$
761: \rho_{\max}^* = C_{\text{QSD}} \cdot C_{\text{FK}}(L_V(\rho_{\max}^*), \gamma, T, V_{\max})
762: $$
763: 
764: provides a self-consistent density bound.
